description: Check the seller's eligibility to create a GMS campaign

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner id is necessary (user registration id accepted)

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Format: ms

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access. Using to identify your permission to use API. Visit the manage your access_token page for details

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param to indicate shop.

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id and path. timestamp=timestamp. Calculation: hex_encode(hmac-sha256(path|timestamp,partner_key))

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if not empty. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Indicate error details if not empty. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: warning
response_fields.description: Indicate warning details if not empty. Empty if no warning happened

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for the API request for error tracking

response_fields.name: is_eligible
response_fields.description: Indicates if the seller is eligible to create a GMS Campaign

response_fields.name: reason
response_fields.description:
The following are the list of reasons for not being able to create a GMS Campaign:
- There is already an existing GMS Campaign
- not_authorized
- The seller is not onboarded to GMS program
- The seller does not have enough sale items in the shop
- Seller is onboarded to fs_gso_pilot_boost
